info.statues.book.core.entry.name: Standbeeld Kern
info.statues.book.core.text1: Standbeeld Kernen zijn buit van Standbeeld Vleermuizen.$(br)De Standbeeld Vleermuizen kunnen in donkere ruimtes gevonden worden net zoals normale vleermuizen maar pas op! Het vecht terug als je hem probeerd te doden.
info.statues.book.info.desc: Algemene info over Standbeelden en de functies.
info.statues.book.info.name: Informatie
info.statues.book.landing: Een book om je te helpen uit te vissen wat de Standbeelden doen.
info.statues.book.name: Standbeelden
info.statues.book.statue_table.text1: The S.T.A.T.U.E. or Standbeeld Table for Applying Tiered Upgrade Enhancements is a worktable that can be used to upgrade Standbeelds.
info.statues.book.subtitle: Kleine nuttige wezens
info.statues.book.upgrading.entry.name: Verbeteren
info.statues.book.upgrading.text1: The Standbeeld Upgrading System allows players to upgrade and level up their mob statues. This entry will provide an overview of how the system works and what upgrades are available.
info.statues.book.upgrading.text2: To start upgrading a statue, players first need to obtain a statue of the desired mob. This can be done by killing the mob, with a 1%% chance of obtaining the statue by default (which can be changed in the config). In addition to the statue itself, players also need to obtain a $(l:info/core)Standbeeld Core$().
info.statues.book.upgrading.text3: Once the player has obtained a statue and a Standbeeld Core, they need to craft a $(l:info/statue_table)S.T.A.T.U.E$() ("Standbeeld Table for Applying Tiered Upgrade Enhancements") and insert the Standbeeld Core and desired statue. After pressing the "Chisel" button, the statue will be upgraded to a state in which it can level up.
info.statues.book.upgrading.text4: After upgrading the statue, players can level it up by killing 10 more of the corresponding mob while the statue is in their inventory. Every 10 mobs will unlock an upgrade slot up to a max of 16.
info.statues.book.upgrading.text5: There are several different upgrades available for the statues:$(br)$(l)Glowing$() - Allows the statue to emit light$(br)$(l)Unglowing$() - Removes previously applied glowing$(br)$(l)Spawner$() - Allows the statue to spawn it's mob every so often$(br)$(l)Despawner$() - Disallows it's mob from spawning in the nearby area
info.statues.book.upgrading.text6: $(l)Mob Killer$() - Kills the mob if it gets nearby (1 = Regular drops, 2 = Player drops, 3 = Player drops + XP)$(br)$(l)Looting$() - Allows the statue to generate loot$(br)$(l)Automation$() - Allows exporting of loot$(br)$(l)Speed$() - Speeds up the interaction/spawning timer
info.statues.book.upgrading.text7: $(l)Interaction$() - Allows special interactions$(br)$(l)Sound$() - Allows the statue to make sound when right-clicked or powered
option.statues.player.name: Speler Standbeeld Gebruikersnaam?
statues.cup.info: Niet te geloven dat het eetbaar is.
statues.gui.jei.statue.info: %s kan verkegen worden als buit met %s percent kans door het doden van %s
statues.gui.jei.statue_core.info: %s kan woden verkegen door %s te doden
statues.gui.jei.statue_core.info2: De %s kan net zoals in vanilla gevonden worden in donkere ruimtes, maar wees voorzichtig!
statues.gui.jei.statue_table.info: Het Standbeeld Verbetering Systeem zorgt ervoor dat spelers hun standbeelden kunnen verbeteren en hun level kan verhogen. Hier is een overzicht van hoe het systeem werkt, en welke verteringen beschikbaar zijn.
statues.gui.jei.statue_table.info2: Om te beginnen een standbeeld te verbeteren, moeten de spelers een standbeeld krijgen ven het gewilde wezens.
statues.gui.jei.statue_table.info3: Once the player has obtained a Standbeeld and a Standbeeld Core, they need to craft a §c§lS.T.A.T.U.E§r ("Standbeeld Table for Applying Tiered Upgrade Enhancements") and insert the Standbeeld Core and desired statue. After pressing the "Chisel" button, the statue will be upgraded to a state in which it can level up.
statues.gui.jei.statue_table.info4: After upgrading the statue, players can level it up by killing 10 more of the corresponding mob while the statue is in their inventory. Every 10 mobs will unlock an upgrade slot up to a max of 16.
statues.gui.jei.statue_table.info5: There are several different upgrades available for the statues:
statues.gui.jei.statue_table.info6:
§lGlowing§r - Allows the statue to emit light
§lUnglowing§r - Removes previously applied glowing
§lSpawner§r - Allows the statue to spawn it's mob every so often
§lDespawner§r - Disallows it's mob from spawning in the nearby area
statues.gui.jei.statue_table.info7:
§lMob Killer§r - Kills the mob if it gets nearby (1 = Regular drops, 2 = Player drops, 3 = Player drops + XP)
§lLooting§r - Allows the statue to generate loot
§lAutomation§r - Allows exporting of loot
§lSpeed§r - Speeds up the interaction/spawning timer
statues.gui.jei.statue_table.info8:
§lInteraction§r - Allows special interactions
§lSound§r - Allows the statue to make sound when right-clicked or powered
statues.player.compass.offline: %s kan niet gevonden worden, misschien is de speler niet online.
